articles.title: Trump asks New York appeals court to dismiss hush money case before sentencing - Reuters.com
articles.description: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump asked a New York appellate court on Tuesday to throw out his conviction on criminal charges stemming from hush money paid to a porn star, and to dismiss the case before his scheduled Friday sentencing.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: As Biden nears exit, US bans medical debt from credit reports - Reuters
articles.description: President Joe Biden's outgoing administration announced on Tuesday a ban on medical debt in American consumers' credit reports, making good on a campaign year pledge less than two weeks before leaving office.
